Module com.github.cowwoc.requirements10.java
Package com.github.cowwoc.requirements10.java.validator

Interface StringValidator

All Superinterfaces:
ObjectComponent<StringValidator,String>, ValidatorComponent<StringValidator,String>
public interface StringValidator extends ValidatorComponent<StringValidator,String>, ObjectComponent<StringValidator,String>
Validates the state of a String.
